live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
27064.summary: Some customers in the South Wellington area of Nanaimo and customers on Gabriola Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27064.title: Oct 10 – Nanaimo (South Wellington) & Gabriola Island| All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
